com.inet.jortho

Interface LanguageChangeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckerListener

    public interface LanguageChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    A language change event gets fired whenever the language is changed. You can register a LanguageChangeListener in the class SpellChecker.
    See Also:
    SpellChecker.addLanguageChangeLister(LanguageChangeListener), SpellChecker.removeLanguageChangeLister(LanguageChangeListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void languageChanged(LanguageChangeEvent ev)
      This method gets called when the language is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • languageChanged

        void languageChanged(LanguageChangeEvent ev)
        This method gets called when the language is changed. This occurs if the user selects another language in the languages menu.
        Parameters:
        ev - A LanguageChangeEvent object describing the changes.
